short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set and forget. No need to re-select your subtitle language anymore.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FEATURES

Preferences:
- Preferred languages
- Update preferred languages on manual selection

Auto-enable:
- Except if spoken in a preferred language
- Except if spoken in the languages...

Translations:
- Show auto-generated subtitle
- Auto-translate subtitle
